# EduVillage – Frontend

This folder contains the frontend part of the **EduVillage – Online Learning Platform**.

## Purpose
The frontend is responsible for:
- Displaying the user interface
- Allowing users to interact with the platform
- Showing courses, dashboards, and progress

## Target Users
- Students
- Teachers
- Administrators

## Features (Planned)
- Login and Registration pages
- Role-based dashboards (Student / Teacher / Admin)
- Course listing and course details
- Student learning dashboard
- Quiz and assessment interface
- Announcements and notifications
- Admin management screens

## Tech Stack (Planned)
- HTML
- CSS
- JavaScript
- (Framework may be added later if approved)

## Current Status
- Project structure initialized
- UI development will start in upcoming phases

## Notes
- UI design will strictly follow Civora Nexus branding guidelines
- No third-party UI themes will be used
